name: Tower of Fire: The Sword of Unspoken Misc
name_original: Tower of Fire: The Sword of Unspoken Misc
description:
Finally, the Power of Sword is in your hands…

When a Blacksmith’s birthright is stolen by evil Blacklords, he must draw upon the might of a mysteriously empowered sword to reclaim it.

It doesn’t matter that he doesn’t know what his birthright is, or what the sword is - all he knows is that its power is apparent and indisputable. Is it the power to slice? The power to dice or be sheathed? Is it the power of mild electro-conductivity or gradual oxidised corrosion? All of the above? He intends to find out as he wields these obvious and irrefutable powers to slaughter mighty enemies, mostly chickens, solve puzzles and have strict words with those who brought him into this mess.

The Sword of Unspoken Misc is an absurd, short, Heavy Metal comedy adventure game. It’s full of puzzles, chuckles and tough combat. It’s the perfect way to spend a lazy Sunday for the price of a cup of coffee, provided that cup of coffee is about five U.S. bucks.

This game inherits the look and feel of a DS game, with a custom retro engine, whilst following the exceptional storyline that is Tower of Fire’s The Sword of Unspoken Misc. It’s a two hour adventure that will have you crawling dungeons, solving puzzles, hacking, slashing and adventuring to the tune of Double Ought Power Metal.

  • A two hour adventure game
  • A tonne of fighting chickens and other enemies, with swords
  • An odd sword-swapping single-item inventory
  • A true-to-canon storyline, complete with Power Metal interuptions
  • Puzzles
  • Dungeons
  • Collectables
  • Scaling health systems
  • Redeem your birthright (maybe)
  • Fight chicken
  • Defeat the Blacklord by being good at the game.
